description:
Zeus pursues the Straw Hats as Nami keeps him occupied. She has a shocking surprise in store for him, however, that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper find the Shark Submerge in a strange situation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!
Ein donnernder Gegenangriff! – Nami und die Gewitterwolke Zeus
Hangeki no Ikazuchi: Nami to Raiun Zeus!
La contre-attaque foudroyante. Nami et Zeus le nuage orageux !
Молниеносная контратака! Нами и Зевс создают грозу!
反撃の雷[いかずち] ナミと雷雲ゼウス!
